name: UpdateGuestStatus
description:
Updates the status of an event guest.

Use this tool to change the status of a guest in an event, such as marking them as confirmed, declined, or pending.

parameters.name: guest_status_update_info
parameters.description: JSON object containing guest details, event API ID, status, and refund option.

should_refund.description: If you are declining a guest and they have paid, should we refund their payment?
